title: Discovery of novel SS-31 (D-Arg-dimethylTyr-Lys-Phe-NH2) derivatives as potent agents to ameliorate inflammation and increase mitochondrial ATP synthesis
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,29789-29799
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05517A, Paper

Mei Li, Deyuan Kong, Liying Meng, Zheyi Wang, Zetai Bai, Guanzhao Wu
5f and 5g exhibit significantly enhanced anti-neuroinflammatory effects compared to SS-31 and mitigate rotenone-induced reductions in neuronal ATP levels, as well as the associated increase in mitochondrial reactive oxygen species.
